contents.description: El yuca Mayan habanero sauces
contents.name: Chef Mateo's

contents.description: With tomato-habanero sauce & cured red onions
contents.name: Pack of Cold Tamales

contents.text: El yuca mayan habanero salsas are made from the chef’s homegrown Sonoma county chilies – he farms & harvests his own peppers, then handcrafts & personally bottles his 100 percent all-natural recipes in small batches. With four distinct sauces, each blend offers its own unique taste profile & heat level. The base is simple, celebrating premium ingredients such as farmer’s market-fresh carrot, onion, Preston vineyards’ olive oil & white vinegar. But chef Mateo amps the intensity from mild kick to scorching, celebrating his selected chills’ signature flavors. The salsas adds extra personality to any dish, from breakfast eggs, to soups, to tacos, to juicy grilled meats, & they aren’t your everyday hot sauces -- their rich flavors enhance rather than overpower even the most delicate foods. Use them as a condiment, as a “secret ingredient” to your favorite recipes, or as a flavorful dip w/ cool cheeses like mozzarella balls finished w/ a pinch of sea salt

contents.description: The original sauce, based on mateo’s mother delmi’s recipe. A rich golden-ochre color, made from peak-of-the-season peppers & crisp, fresh carrots. Flavors remind of bright yellow lemon & plum, w/ tangy high notes. Serving recommendations include ceviche & other tropical dishes
contents.name: Mayan Habanero

contents.description: Deep & dark, showcasing habaneros smoked in traditional yucatan style over local oak, sweetened ever-so-slightly w/ local carrots & preston olive oil. This savory sauce has a subtle smoky flavor w/ hints of tamarind & tropical ripe mango. Best served w/ meats & wild game roasted medium rare, plus natural fat or cool cheeses
contents.name: Ahumado

contents.description: This first-pick-of-the-season habanero comes when mateo thins the crop of green peppers among the ripening yellow chiles. The delicate fruits are combined w/ onion, garlic, vinegar & olive oil flash-roasted in a drum, resulting in a bright, beautiful sauce showing kefir lime, blossoms & gravenstein apple.It adds a lovely spicy-floral accent to eggs, chorizo, cheeses & salads
contents.name: Verde

contents.description: These late harvest “last pick” chiles celebrate the ripest, most robust habaneros, & therefore, the hottest of the bunch. Hold on for some serious spice, but also magically exotic notes of mandarin orange & clove. Surprise yourself w/ how well this sauce adds life & layers to classic favorites like mac –n-cheese & sweet BBQ ribs.
contents.name: Amarilla Rostizado

contents.name: Danish Mary

contents.description: Gin, house-made bloody mary mix and a splash of lemon juice
contents.name: Red Snapper

contents.description: Gin, fresh mint, ginger syrup and lime juice topped with ginger ale. Served on the rocks in a tall glass with a squeeze of lime. An adaptation of the ‘favorite cocktail’ from drinks (1914), by jacques straub
contents.name: Ginger Rogers

contents.description: Gin muddled with cucumber, a healthy splash of pimm’s no.1, lemon juice, and simple syrup. Shaken and served up with a cucumber slice and a house-pickled onion. Concocted by dr. schwartz to provide relief to those arriving at our door by way of san francisco’s municipal railway
contents.name: 21 Hayes Damrak

contents.description: Apricot liqueur,‍ dry vermouth, and a touch of lemon juice. Shaken and served up in a cocktail glass with a lemon twist. A recipe adapted from the savoy cocktail book (1930), by harry craddock
contents.name: Darb Cocktail Gin

contents.description: Ransom old tom gin, carpano ‘antica formula’ sweet vermouth, a splash of maraschino liqueur, and a dash of orange bitters. stirred and served up with a twist. professor jerry Thomas’s turn-of-the-century cocktail, which many argue is the forefather of the martini
contents.name: Martinez

contents.description: Gin, lemon juice, maraschino liqueur, and orange bitters. Shaken and served in a cocktail glass with a brandied cherry. A recipe from the how and when (1938) by g. f. marco
contents.name: Casino

contents.description: Hendrick’s gin, lemon-lime juice, simple syrup, and a dash each of green and yellow chartreuse. shaken and served up with a lime twist. this recipe was resurrected by our bartender “d Mexican” from his hometown, guadalajara
contents.name: Mujer Verde

contents.description: Russell’s reserve 6 yr. rye, carpano antica formula’ sweet vermouth, and a dash each of orange bitters and angostura bitters. Served up with brandied cherries and an orange twist. This is our version of one of the all time great cocktails
contents.name: ‘Uptown’ Manhattan

contents.description: Rye whisky, a dash of peychaud’s bitters, and a touch of sugar. stirred and served in a coupe glass rinsed with pernod absinthe with a lemon twist. a classic absinthe cocktail from famous new orleans drinks (1940), by Stanley Clisby Arthur
contents.name: Sazerac

contents.description: Rye whiskey, cynar aperitif, amontillado sherry. Stirred and served up with an orange peel. Peace is where you find it (f#*@’n hippie proverbs). We hope this helps your search
contents.name: Inner Peace

contents.description: Rum, lime juice, apricot brandy, pineapple gum, and orange bitters. shaken and served up with a lemon twist. adapted from Charles h. baker’s gentleman’s companion, 1939. this cocktail was created by will p taylor, an American and onetime manager of Cuba’s hotel Nacional
contents.name: Will P. Taylor's Hotel Nacional Special

contents.description: Goslings dark‍ rum, lime juice, simple syrup, a splash of orange juice, and a dash of orange bitters. inspired by the Havana cocktail, taken from the the savoy cocktail book (1930), by harry craddock
contents.name: Old Havana

contents.description: Hangar one Buddha’s-hand vodka, ginger syrup, lemon juice, ginger ale, and a splash of cranberry juice. this cocktail is a variation of our non-alcoholic beverage absinthe lemonade” created by marcovaldo dionysos. a great drink made better when someone came up with the bright idea of putting a shot of booze in it
contents.name: Citron Lemonade

contents.description: Vodka, pear brandy, lemon juice, sugar, and a splash of orange juice. Shaken and served up in a cocktail glass with a sugared rim
contents.name: Perfect Pear

contents.description: One Buddha’s-hand vodka, campari, grapefruit juice, and lemon wedges. served long over ice with a lemon twist. an elixir by toni abou-ganim, designed for the Bellagio, las Vegas. a modern leap for cocktails in the 1990’s
contents.name: Joy Ride Hangar

contents.description: Brandy, maraschino liqueur, curaçao, lemon juice, and angostura bitters.Shaken and served up in a sugar rimmed wine glass with a long lemon twist. This ‘big easy’ classic originally created by joe santini in the 1850’s is an arguable precursor to the sidecar, although we think this adaptation from here’s how (1941), by W.C. whitfield is a bit of an improvement
contents.name: Crusta

contents.description: Pisco, kaffir-lime leaf and pepper syrup, lemon-lime juice, and a splash of grapefruit juice. Shaken and served up with sunken brandied cherries. This is a xanadoozle creation, named in honor of kurt vonnegut’s eponymous modern classic
contents.name: Galapagos

contents.description: Pisco, apricot‍ liqueur, lime juice, and a float of black rum. Shaken and served up with a sunken cherry. Inspired by one of our restaurant’s more unfortunate personalities, our bar back mr. chauca. We hope that you get to meet him
contents.name: Chauca

contents.description: Rye whiskey, pimm’s no. 1, dubonnet rouge, dashes of peach and mint bitters. Stirred and served up with a mint leaf and a lemon twist. The name for this cocktail is inspired by L.B.J. And the hope for better times to come. Lord only knows, that if we’re not gonna be $#*%%!ñ in high cotton, then we’ll soon be making this cocktail up north with canadian whiskey
contents.name: High Cotton

contents.description: Gin, fresh mint, ginger syrup, and lemon juice, topped with ginger beer. Served on the rocks in a tall glass with a squeeze of lime. An adaptation of the ‘favorite cocktail’ from drinks, (1914), by jacques straub
contents.name: Ginger Rogers

contents.description: Gin, dubonnet rouge, maraschino liquor, and orange bitters. Stirred and served up with an orange peel. A turn of the century classic, adapted from the official mixer’s manual, (1934), by patrick gavin duffy
contents.name: L'Opera

contents.description: Gin, lemon juice, maraschino liqueur, and orange bitters. Shaken and served up in a cocktail glass with a brandied cherry. A recipe from the how and when, 1938 by g. f. marco
contents.name: Casino

contents.description: Goslings dark rum, curaçao, fresh lemon-lime juice, simple syrup, a splash of orange juice and a touch of orange bitters. Inspired by the havana cocktail taken from the the savoy cocktail book by harry craddock, 1930
contents.name: Old Havana

contents.description: Brandy, maraschino liqueur, curaçao, lemon juice, and angostura bitters. Shaken and served up in a sugar rimmed wine glass with a long lemon twist. This ‘big easy’ classic originally created by joe santini in the 1850’s is an arguable precursor to the sidecar, although we think this adaptation from here’s how (1941), by W.C. whitfield is a bit of an improvement
contents.name: Crusta

contents.description: Pisco, kaffir lime-pepper syrup, lemon-lime juice, and a splash of grapefruit juice. Shaken and served up with sunken brandied cherries. A xanadoozle creation named in honor of kurt vonnegut’s modern classic of the same name.
contents.name: Galapagos

contents.description: Vodka, pear brandy, lemon juice, sugar, and a splash of orange juice. Shaken and served up in a cocktail glass with a sugared rim.
contents.name: Perfect Pear

contents.description: Rum, lime juice, simple syrup, angostura bitters, and a splash of grapefruit juice. Shaken and served up with a lime wedge. A refreshing rum cocktail adapted from here’s how, (1928), by judge jr.
contents.name: Nevada

contents.description: Jameson whiskey,‍ a whisper of ginger syrup and a touch of orange bitters. Stirred and served up with an orange twist. A recipe created by uncle jack kelleher of the gravedigger’s bar, dublin, after he got hit by an early morning guinness truck and needed a healthy elixir for his pains. Brought to these shores by the man
contents.name: Daedalus

contents.description: Rye whiskey, dashes of peychaud’s bitters and a touch of sugar. Stirred and served in a cocktail glass rinsed with absinthe, lemon twist. A classic absinthe cocktail from famous new orleans drinks (1940), by stanley clisby arthur
contents.name: Sazerac

contents.text: Reposado, meaning rested, refers to a style of tequila that is aged anywhere from two months to a year in oak barrels, often previously used for whiskey. Aging the tequila mellows the natural agave flavors and the sweet oak imparts a smooth finish.

contents.text: In Venice, cicchetti (small plates) are cold and hot dishes prepared from seasonal items available in the fresh markets.
Cicchetti are meant to be shared – we recommend two or three per person. We hope you enjoy the tastes of our Venetian cuisine.

contents.text: Organic products are used in every facial & no generic products are ever considered. Io incorporates lavish massage throughout our san francisco skin care services.

Curative IO Facials, located in our San Francisco spa, draw from select products made of fresh herbal & plant extracts, essential oils, naturally active enzymes, alpha-hydroxy acids & antioxidant vitamins. Product lines include Arcona, Astara, Dr. Alkaitis, Dr. Hauschka, In Fiore, iS CLINICAL, & Skinceuticals.

contents.description: This powerful organic facial combines skin cleansing & enzymatic exfoliation w/ super-rehydration. Invigorating facial massage for increased elasticity is coupled w/ lymph stimulation for toxin & fluid release. Utilizing only pure organic ingredients & the fragrance & healing power of exotic flowers & wild herbs, this facial uncovers your dewy, revitalized skin in a beautiful pairing of mother nature & able hands. 75 Minutes for
contents.name: Organic Detox Facelift

contents.description: Our signature mix of deep cleansing, toning, double exfoliation, in-depth pore extraction, specialty treatment mask & rehydration. A combination of intelligent skin therapy & pampered relaxation, this facial is highly recommended for congested skin. No pore left unturned in this san francisco facial. 75 Minutes for
contents.name: Deep Cleanse

contents.description: Our specialty facial, created in our san francisco spa, serves up a fruit cocktail of pineapple, papaya & grapefruit in an enzyme mask custom mixed for the specific skin care needs of each client. These enzymes break down dead layers of skin & rapidly accelerate regeneration of new cells leaving the skin polished & vibrant. 60 Minutes for

options.name: Focus 1. pore clarifying-for the impurity-prone & those of us w/ skin congestion. Powerful glycolic & salicylic acids arrest bacteria & soften skin for easier pore extraction of problem areas.

Focus 2. lift & hydrate-for those of us w/ tired, thirsty skin in need of a supercharged lift. Get your glow w/ uplifting facial massage & (drum roll, please! ) No extractions necessary. Walk out of our san francisco spa replenished, radiant & ready to be seen.

contents.name: Custom Enzyme Boost

contents.description: This efficient facial gives the skin a lovely boost, a simple clean up w/ a focus on exfoliation & hydration. Intended as maintenance check up between regularly scheduled full length facials & not suggested for io facial first-timers. Recommended for normal, dry, sensitive & mature skin but not recommended for problematic or congested skin. No extractions. 45 Minutes for
contents.name: Targeted Mini Facial

contents.description: Our acupuncture facial delivers radiance & internal healing using traditional chinese medicine techniques. This balancing facial softens lines & wrinkles, stimulates collagen production & revives skin back to brilliance. Gentle needle application reduces tension & improves muscle tone. Suggested series of 10-20 facials for ultimate results. Uplift the spirit. 75 Minutes for
contents.name: Acupuncture Restorative Facial

contents.text: Add-on the following additions to your facial.

contents.description: This advanced treatment offers a double whammy of exfoliation & powerful anti-oxidant delivery to protect, correct, & stimulate cell renewal; helpful for sun damage, acne, wrinkles, & hyper-pigmentation. Peels contain Lactic, Salicylic, Glycolic and/or Retinol specifically chosen for your skin type. We focus on offering the best skin care services in San Francisco. A smart addition to our Deep Cleanse for
contents.name: Intelligent Peel

contents.description: Power packed w/ glycolic acid, retinol, niacin, & antioxidants, this advanced treatment rapidly resurfaces the skin, leaving it picture perfect & polished. A graceful addition to our deep cleanse facial for
contents.name: Resurfacing Mask

contents.description: This back treatment will put your back in action, beautifully. Triple exfoliated w/ clarisonic body brush, a deep cleansing scrub & a potent fruit enzyme cocktail, your back will be clean as a whistle, well-buffed, massaged & hydrated w/ artisanal in fiore body balm for one happy & beautiful back. 30 Minutes for
contents.name: Back to Beautiful

contents.description: Lavish head & neck massage w/ hot towels & neem essential oil to replenish hair & scalp. 15 Minutes for
contents.name: Head, Neck & Hair Repair

contents.description: Brighten & tighten the eye area w/ this collagen treatment. Reduce puffiness & minimize fine lines for
contents.name: Bright Eyes

contents.description: Extend your facial to lovingly include your décolleté. Every step of our signature facial will give generous attention to an oft-forgotten, over sun-exposed upper chest, leaving you w/ a rejuvenated & rejoicing bosom for
contents.name: Décolleté Love

contents.description: Perfect your glow for the big day. Slip into a series of 3 Custom Enzyme San Francisco Facials & radiate all the way down the aisle. Extend your final facial to seal in ultimate perfection w/ 1 Decollete Love & 1 Bright Eyes facial add-ons. One step closer towards pure marital bliss
contents.name: Io Blissful Bride Package

contents.text: All IO Waxing is performed w/ graceful technique & the aromatherapeutic & antiseptic benefits of our farm fresh OM OF NM Organic Essential Oil Hydrosols from the IO family farm. Bikini & Brazilian waxing also utilizes the soothing & seductive In Fiore Bikini Balm w/ Tuberose.

contents.description: For 15 minutes or less.
contents.name: Extended Waxing

contents.text: Only organic & natural creams & oils are used in io massages
Swedish-based massage combined w/ techniques such as Acupressure, Thai, Hawaiian Lomi Lomi & Chinese Tui Na. The IO 45 minute massage targets problem areas in the body w/ efficiency.

contents.description: The fabulous original.
contents.name: Io Massage

contents.description: Take your IO Massage over the top w/ two practitioners at once. 60 minutes for
contents.name: Four-Handed Massage

contents.description: For those of you that like it strong! Deep tissue works deeply into the second muscle layer to address tension that exists there
contents.name: Pure 100 Percent Deep Tissue Massage

contents.description: This treatment imparts only rare organic ingredients to the body w/ IO Enrich lotion to hydrate & soften the skin & IO Anoint oil w/ aromatic Jasmine & healing Green Tea. A vitalizing blend of massage techniques include Swedish to melt tension, Shiatsu to awaken energy pathways & Thai Yoga stretches for deep release. 60 minutes for
contents.name: Io Organic Fusion Massage

contents.description: Here the signature IO Massage is customized into an excellent maternity massage w/ props & pillows for relaxed comfort.
contents.name: Mom-to-Be Massage

contents.description: Select one of our in fiore body balms to make your IO massage even more magnificent. choose from

options.name: Dayala euphoric blend-jasmine & lemongrass. This relaxing & euphoric blend promotes well-being, helps in pain reduction & improves circulation
Jolie balancing blend-rose, bergamot & chamomile. This nourishing blend is ideal for treating dry & sensitive skin (including eczema & rosacea)
Shevanti sensual blend-ylang ylang, patchouli, frankincense & rose. Earthy & sweet, shevanti is ultra-decadent & completely revitalizing.
Tiagi tranquil blend-lavender, neroli & lemon. Put insomnia & anxiety to bed w/ this nervous system sedative. This blend is also ideal during pregnancy as it helps prevent & heal stretch marks.

contents.name: Essential Oil Massage

contents.description: Heated basalt river rocks are placed on the body’s key energy points to stimulate & invigorate. The warmth of the stones deeply penetrates the muscle layer. IO Anoint oil adds warmth & healing power to this deeply relaxing & muscle-loosening massage. 90 minutes for
contents.name: Hot Stone Massage w/ Io Anoint Oil

contents.description: Traditional Thai Massage is performed on a soft floor mat, & you remain dressed in loose, comfortable clothing (BYO). This massage targets pressure points along the body’s energy lines. Various yoga stretches are assisted by your practitioner. A highly effective way to increase range of motion, body alignment & overall physical & mental energy levels. This ancient massage technique is deep & balancing.
contents.name: Thai Massage

contents.description: IO Acupuncture treatments usually start w/ bodywork (Acupressure, Tui Na & Chi Nei Tsang), are followed by needle application & end w/ a warm cup of tea. Treatments address general medical issues & also specialize in pain management, mental health & women’s issues.
contents.name: Io Acupuncture

contents.text: Add any of the following experiences to your massage

contents.description: A heady & hydrating scalp treatment w/ Ayurvedic roots. Engage vital points on the scalp w/ organic IO Anoint oil made from the ceremonial flowers, White Lotus & Jasmine, in a base of Avocado & Green Tea-infused Grapeseed oil. The ritual completes w/ hot towels & balancing point work. Add this experience to any IO Massage for
contents.name: Aromatic Scalp Treatment

contents.description: Radiant heat soothes achiness & tension. Increased blood flow draws out toxins, oxygenates & brings nutrients to targeted areas. This healing art form helps cleanse negativity & emanate healing power. One stroke w/ a Hot Stone is like 10 strokes w/ a hand. Add the grounding earth element of Hot Stones to any IO Massage for
contents.name: Healing Hot Stones

contents.description: Add your favorite essential oil blend in a hydrating base of grapeseed oil for
contents.name: In Fiore Body Balms

contents.description: A great place for beginners as well as experienced students who want to get back to basics.
contents.name: Level 1

contents.description: Previous yoga experienced required: at least ten vinyasa classes prior to entry. Appropriate for intermediate students who are familiar w/ the sun salutations, standing & seated postures, & feel comfortable in twists, backbends, & inversions.
contents.name: Level 2

contents.description: In this practice, students flow from one posture to another, synchronizing breath & movement. Often the class begins w/ sun salutations, standing poses, & balancing postures, then moves to seated forward-folds, twists, backbends & inversions. Exertion may range from mild to vigorous & emphasis may vary depending on each teacher. (For a perfect fit, please read the teacher’s biography).
contents.name: Vinyasa

contents.description: This practice enables deep relaxation. Bolsters & blankets are used to support the body in various poses for extended periods of time. Especially good for stress relief, injury, pregnancy, & meditative purposes. Imagine these benefits as well as feeling at ease in the relaxing & mind opening city of san francisco.
contents.name: Restorative
